attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lloyd-TSB are currently charging their customers £15 for exceeding the agreed limit on their current account followed by another charge of £15 per day (upto max 10 days) until the account is brought back within the agreed limit.  These charge days also include bank holidays and weekends. So if you went £20 over your agreed limit you would receive a charge of £165.

This is not fair for the struggling public.  We need our PM to stop Lloyds-TSB taking advantage of their customers.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
